short_summary: Foundation Repairs for the Embassy of Canada to Czech Republic, in Prague
description: His Majesty the King in right of Canada, represented by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for foundation repairs at the Embassy of Canada to the Czech Republic, in Prague. The foundation repairs are limited to the Official Residence and will include, demolition work, earthworks, perimeter drainage connected to the sewer, chemical grouting, waterproofing, grading and interior repairs.
full_summary:
# Foundation Repairs at the Embassy of Canada to the Czech Republic in Prague

### Tender Reference Number:
cb-8003-35602808

### Amended Solicitation Number:
24-245389

### Tender Closing Date:
August 25, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Procurement Description:
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development, on behalf of His Majesty the King in right of Canada, invites contractors to submit a qualification to support the proposed works for foundation repairs at the Embassy of Canada to the Czech Republic in Prague. This project includes the demolition work, earthworks, perimeter drainage connected to the sewer, chemical grouting, waterproofing, grading, and interior repairs at the Official Residence.

### Two-Stage Tendering
The procurement will proceed through two stages: Request for Qualification (RQ) and Request for Proposal (RFP).  The RQ is designed to prequalify contractors with the necessary expertise to participate in the subsequent RFP.

### Prequalification Information
The RQ package can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/#/public/tender/view/8003129009Q](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/#/public/tender/view/8003129009Q). Interested contractors must submit their application for prequalification by August 25, 2023.

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
Selected contractors will be invited to participate in the subsequent RFP process, where they will be required to submit a detailed proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and pricing for the project.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Tanya Di Virgilio, 
International Cooperation Branch, 
Real Property Contracts Office, 
Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development, 
(343) 548-8491, 
realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca

### Notice of Tenders
Notice of tenders will be announced through the following websites:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/\#public/tender/view/8003129009Q](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/#/public/tender/view/8003129009Q)
* [https://publictenders.canada.ca/\#public/tender/view/8003129009Q](https://publictenders.canada.ca/#/public/tender/view/8003129009Q)

### Category:
Infrastructure Construction

### Services:
Building Construction Services, Construction, Residential
